query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS workshop_production_lines (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  workshop_id INT NOT NULL,
  production_line_id INT NOT NULL,
  assigned_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  assigned_by INT,
  notes TEXT,
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_workshop_production_lines_workshop (workshop_id),
  INDEX idx_workshop_production_lines_line (production_line_id),
  UNIQUE INDEX idx_workshop_production_lines_unique (workshop_id, production_line_id)
);

  INDEX idx_workshop_production_lines_workshop (workshop_id),
